selections.name: He Is The Kiss
selections.reason: Consistent performer rating 130. Coming off a solid 2nd at Ipswich and drawn perfectly in barrier 1. The one to beat.

selections.name: Grafting
selections.reason: Showed promise on debut with a 2nd at Ballina. Matthew Dunn stable is elite here. Improver.

selections.name: Puligny
selections.reason: Steady form, finishing 5th last start but not far away. Drawn well and fits in the exotics.

selections.name: Vostokova
selections.reason: Resuming. Showed ability in previous prep and trials suggest readiness.

danger_horse.name: Grafting
danger_horse.reason: Lightly raced improver from top local stable who could take a big step forward.

selections.name: Joanjett
selections.reason: Strong 2nd last start at Ballina. Ratings figures are superior to this depleted field. Looks the winner.

selections.name: Sources Link
selections.reason: Finished 4th at Armidale recently. Consistent enough to place here.

selections.name: Righteous Brother
selections.reason: Resuming. Previous form is competitive for this weak maiden.

selections.name: Mehi
selections.reason: First starter. Watch betting, but field is thin enough to feature.

selections.name: Zweigelt
selections.reason: First starter for Matthew Dunn. Won a trial at Eagle Farm. Stable strikes at high rate with debutants.

selections.name: Tribbiani (NZ)
selections.reason: Consistent type with a rating of 130. 4th last start at Ballina. Good barrier.

selections.name: Aweigh
selections.reason: Resuming. Has placed form at Gold Coast. Solid each-way hope.

selections.name: Referees
selections.reason: Debutant. Trial runner-up. Watch market.

danger_horse.name: Tribbiani (NZ)
danger_horse.reason: Experience edge over the top pick.

selections.name: Tophet
selections.reason: Won well last start at Ballina. Rating 138 is highest in field. Drawn the rail. Hard to beat.

selections.name: Supersonic Man (GB)
selections.reason: Won at this track last start. Proven course performer.

selections.name: Zaindara
selections.reason: Last start winner at Ballina. Progressive filly.

selections.name: Archers Reign
selections.reason: Resuming. Drops in class and drawn well.

danger_horse.name: Supersonic Man (GB)
danger_horse.reason: Track specialist who won here recently.

selections.name: Arctic Legend
selections.reason: Dropping significantly in class from Quality/Open company to Class 4. Rating 136. Should dominate.

selections.name: Decisive Lass
selections.reason: Placed in BM82 company last start. Strong form lines for this grade.

selections.name: The Gambling Greek
selections.reason: Last start winner at Doomben. In winning form.

selections.name: Immortality
selections.reason: Won last start. Consistent.

danger_horse.name: Decisive Lass
danger_horse.reason: Proven at higher levels and drawn to get a soft run.

selections.name: Shredded
selections.reason: Broke maiden status impressively last start. Matthew Dunn runner drawn barrier 1. Looks capable of repeating.

selections.name: Patrioticintention
selections.reason: Consistent runner coming off a 2nd. Rating 128 competitive here.

selections.name: Australasia
selections.reason: Good 2nd last start at Grafton. In the mix.

selections.name: Hare Street
selections.reason: Improved effort to run 2nd last time. Place chance.

danger_horse.name: Patrioticintention
danger_horse.reason: Consistent form makes him a threat despite the wide draw.

selections.name: Royal Charge
selections.reason: Massive class drop from Open company to BM58. Even with top weight, class should prevail.

selections.name: In The Fine Print
selections.reason: Last start winner. Rating 136 matches top pick but drawn wide.

selections.name: Inquisitor
selections.reason: Consistent. 2nd last start. Drawn the rail.

selections.name: Justafever
selections.reason: Last start winner at this track. Respect.

danger_horse.name: In The Fine Print
danger_horse.reason: Winning form is good form, main danger if he overcomes the gate.
